LanguageData.Mousekin_ApparelChildOutfit.label: Mouseling Outfit
LanguageData.Mousekin_ApparelChildOutfit.description: A simple shirt and pair of trousers held up by suspenders worn by most commoner and middle-class Mouseling boys, practical for helping around the house or playing in the flower gardens.
LanguageData.Mousekin_ApparelChildDress.label: Mouseling Dress
LanguageData.Mousekin_ApparelChildDress.description: A simple full-body dress worn by most commoner and middle-class Mouseling girls, practical for helping around the house or playing in the flower gardens.
